mapper.insert:
select confirm_seq.nextval from dual
insert into confirm(cf_No, form_No, mem_No, dept_No, reg_No, cf_Title, cf_Content, cf_file) values(#{cfNo}, #{formNo}, #{memNo}, #{deptNo}, #{regNo}, #{cfTitle}, #{cfContent}, #{cfFile})

select confirmfile_seq.nextval from dual
insert into confirmfile values(#{fileNo},#{fileName},#{fileOriginalName},#{fileSize},#{cfNo})
mapper.select: select C.CF_NO, C.FORM_NO, C.MEM_NO, C.CF_TITLE, C.CF_STATE, C.CF_REGDATE, M.MEM_NAME, F.FORM_NAME from confirm C join confirmline CL on C.REG_NO = CL.REG_NO join member M on M.MEM_NO = C.MEM_NO join docform F on F.FORM_NO = C.FORM_NO where C.CF_ORDER = CL.LINE_ORDER and (CL.MEM_NO = #{memNo} or C.mem_no = #{memNo}) and C.CF_STATE = #{state} and C.cf_TMPSTORAGE = 'N'

select C.CF_NO, C.FORM_NO, C.MEM_NO, C.CF_TITLE, C.CF_STATE, C.CF_REGDATE, M.MEM_NAME, F.FORM_NAME from confirm C join member M on M.MEM_NO = C.MEM_NO join docform F on F.FORM_NO = C.FORM_NO where C.form_no in (select form_no from formview where ranks_no <= #{memNo}) and C.cf_okdate is not null and C.cf_TMPSTORAGE = 'N'

select C.CF_NO, C.FORM_NO, C.MEM_NO, C.CF_TITLE, C.CF_STATE, C.CF_REGDATE, M.MEM_NAME, F.FORM_NAME from confirm C join member M on M.MEM_NO = C.MEM_NO join docform F on F.FORM_NO = C.FORM_NO where C.mem_no = #{memNo} and C.cf_TMPSTORAGE = 'Y'
